Welcome to the Coriolis Modern Combat module for FoundryVTT!

The @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.modern_combat_rules.JournalEntry.3bZcoXIKzxKKatl3]{Coriolis ✦ Modern Combat} rules journal is automatically imported.

You can find all other things in the Compendium Packs tab in the sidebar on the right. You don't need to import them, as you can drag necessary items from the compendium to an Actor's Sheet when necessary.

Bugs and feature requests can be reported here: https://github.com/yjeroen/foundry-coriolis-modern-combat

Or tag me (@yeroon) on the Year Zero Worlds Discord. 

Setup

If you also have Free League Coriolis modules, you can implement the Moden Combat errata (see @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.modern_combat_rules.JournalEntry.3bZcoXIKzxKKatl3.JournalEntryPage.gSkPsRiUIsEpgqq9]{Errata Core Rulebook}), via the following macro. This will update all Weapon Items within the world (that are present in the Items tab, or on Actors).

@UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.K1dHuTLM1FkcNEp6]{Errata: Update All Weapons}

You can revert back via the following macro:

@UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.8cYoxS1Pj1K5UswH]{Errata: Revert All Weapons Back}

Module Features

The following features are implemented by this module.

  • Coriolis & Modern Combat Status Effects
    • If you have a Cover status effect, you see the Cover bonus options when rolling your armor gear.
    • You automatically gain the Broken By Damage or Broken By Stress effects if your Health or Mind is at 0.
  • Critical Injuries and Mental Trauma often have a linked Condition Item in their description.
    • Drag the Condition to your character sheet if/when you are affected by them. Conditions that affect attributes will do this automatically.
  • New equipment (E-dose, S-dose) and talents. These can be found in the Items Compendium.
  • Near range added for Weapons
  • Sheets and UI updated with the naming of things, like "Health" instead of "Health Points".
  • Updated Initiative Roll rules.
    • Included automated bonuses for your Weapon and if you're Surprise Attacking.
    • Updated prettified Initiative chat message
  • When Combat starts, a "Darkness" combatant is added to the Combat Tracker, with Initiative 0. When the turn of this combatant starts, an automatic event roll is made for the Darkness between the stars.
  • Handy macro's for both the GM and for the Players.

Macro's

The following macro's are handy for the GM to add to their hotbar:

  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.BovZCFLNzpIES5Rt]{Critical Injury to Chat}, to ask a player to roll on the Critical Injury table.
  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.pjBU9pCOWOtjGuS0]{Mental Trauma to Chat}, to ask a player to roll on the Mental Trauma table.
  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.Pxga0mfuI8a6KQAO]{Panic Roll to Chat}, to ask a player to make a Panic Roll.

The following macro's are handy for the Players (and GM) to add to their hotbar:

  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.EE001SKlX47UUvb2]{Coriolis Dice Roll}, for a manual dicepool roll.
  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.7IzxNrjuHggW82cJ]{Toggle Aiming}, as a reminder effect in combat that you're aiming.
  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.HUWz2i2miwGdlrDF]{Toggle Cover}, as a reminder effect in combat that you're in cover. This effect is necessary for the Cover bonus when you roll your armor as defense.
  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.7QeJhvd68j9MpF15]{Toggle Full Dodging}, as a reminder effect in combat that you're focusing on Full Dodging.
  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.Dvmb2QoGmZZHHtR9]{Toggle Grappled}, as a reminder effect in combat that you're grappled.
  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.HL3l92cjvnbO5RJF]{Toggle Overwatch}, as a reminder effect in combat that you're in overwatch.
  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.jGIoxwUJ1P22umUn]{Toggle Prone}, as a reminder effect in combat that you're prone.
  • @UUID[Compendium.coriolis-modern-combat.macros.Macro.Y4UIQZyXumGAeoIV]{Toggle Surprise Attacking}, as a reminder effect before combat that you're planning to make an ambush / surprise attack. As following the rules, first make an INFILTRATION test before adding this effect. This will give you an automated +3 Initiative bonus.
